content.text: Mr. McCLINTOCK. Madam Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. McCLINTOCK

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 7 o'clock and 57 minutes 
p.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until tomorrow, 
Thursday, November 9, 2017, at 9 a.m.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
